version_description:
•Minor bug fixes
•Accessibility bug fixes when voiceover enabled
•Fix to make app compatible with iPad Pro
•Fix to make app compatible on iPad with iOS9.0 onwards
Security enhancements and minor bug fixes

• A brand new look and feel.
• Customise your Visa card settings so you control when and how to use your card.
• TouchID makes it easy and secure to access the NAB app with your fingerprints.
• Set up quick balance and see your balances right this second.
• No need to split bills, you can pay friends using their mobile number. Pay to mobile is our new simpler version of NAB Flik
• Heading overseas? Keep your cards safe by letting us know where you’re going. We’ll make sure your money’s secure.
• Coming soon – Net position. Check the overall balance of all your NAB accounts in one place.

• Bug fixes for version 8.0.0.
• A brand new look and feel.
• Customise your Visa card settings so you control when and how to use your card.
• TouchID makes it easy and secure to access the NAB app with your fingerprints.
• Set up quick balance and see your balances right this second.
• No need to split bills, you can pay friends using their mobile number. Pay to mobile is our new simpler version of NAB Flik.
• Heading overseas? Keep your cards safe by letting us know where you’re going. We’ll make sure your money’s secure.
• Coming soon – Net position. Check the overall balance of all your NAB accounts in one place.

• Net Position – see how your balances tally up on your account summary.
• More control of your cards – permanently block lost or stolen cards and view your new card details straight away.
• Replace cards if they’re damaged or faulty.
• Share receipt – send your payment receipts by SMS, email or even save it to your phone.
• Bug fixes and other enhancements based on your feedback

• With a NAB PayTag you can now tap and pay with your iPhone. Order yours via the app or at nab.com.au/nabpaytag.
• Bug fixes and enhancements based on your feedback
• We’ve fixed a bug that was causing annoying crashes on iPhone and iPad.

• You can upgrade your Business Transaction Account card to a Business Debit Visa card
• Send your bank details – copy and share your BSB and account number at the tap of a finger
• We fixed an annoying bug that was causing the app to crash.

We’ve come a long way in six months. We’ve listened to your feedback and made a lot of changes. So we can better support the app, and the way you use it, we need you to upgrade to the latest, safest, most stable version. We appreciate your feedback and will continue to listen, and to make our app better.

• Quick balance widget - you’ll be able to see your balances without waking up your phone.
• A few bug fixes, accessibility improvements and generally annoying things sorted.

• Delete payees - now you can remove payees that you no longer need, or whose details are out of date so you can keep your payee list nice and tidy.
• Travel tools - a handy foreign exchange calculator and other useful tools to help you manage your spending when you’re overseas.
• A few bug fixes, accessibility improvements and generally annoying things sorted.

• Activate new debit cards (and set up a PIN)
• Change your PIN for your debit cards
• Create (or change) nicknames for your accounts
• Bug fixes:
- Fixed error messages during login when the TouchID token has expired
- Accessibility - fixed VoiceOver issue when swiping where a loading spinner is displayed
- Overseas Travel Notifications – improving pop-up messages
- Security fixes

• View merchant details for credit card transactions.
• Feature enhancements – find us, travel tools and offset accounts.
• Performance improvements.
• Bug fixes.

• Activate new debit cards (and set up a PIN)
• Change your PIN for your debit cards
• Create (or change) nicknames for your accounts
• Bug fixes:
- Fixed error messages during login when the TouchID token has expired
- Accessibility - fixed VoiceOver issue when swiping where a loading spinner is displayed
- Overseas Travel Notifications – improving pop-up messages
- Security fixes

• More detailed information about fee and interest charges from your Transaction History
• View merchant detail for commercial card transactions
• Bug fixes:
Accessibility – large text on the transaction history no longer crops or overlaps
• Bug fix: Quick Balance was sometimes not restoring from a phone backup properly.

• Afterpay - find out more and register
• Visa Checkout - find out more and register
• My details - 'Preferred name' for Business customers
• iOS 11 uplift (more in next release)
• Bug Fixes - modifying future dated payments

• Log on with Face ID (iPhone X only)
• Support for iPhone X

• View information about where, when and who you used your card with
• Opt in to register your card to receive push notifications for all approved or declined card transactions

Bug Fixes:
• Some customers experienced a crash when they had recurring payments set up with iOS11.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Ability to scan and deposit cheques, instead of visiting a branch or ATM.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:

- General performance, stability and security improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:
- Home loan customers can now see their scheduled direct debits and transfers in their Transaction History screen.
- Some customers who successfully logged in with their fingerprint were being asked to log in again.
- Some home loan customers were unable to redraw their account.
- Improved stability for international payments.
- Improved data quality for our Branch and ATM location data.
- Accessibility improvements.

• View your credit card statement due date from your transaction history screen.
• View and update your tax details for Australia, U.S. and other countries.
• Update your addresses and contact numbers.

Bug fixes:
• Fixed accessibility issues in the transaction history and Payment confirmation screens.

• Make fast payments (also known as NPP payments) with eligible accounts - to PayIDs or BSB and account numbers.
• Create PayIDs using your mobile number, email address or business number (ABN).
• Enter detailed descriptions of up to 280 characters for fast payments.

Bug fixes:
• When accessing the device contact list and linked contacts were present, the app was crashing.

• View your credit card statement due date from your transaction history screen.
• View and update your tax details for Australia, U.S. and other countries.
• Update your addresses and contact numbers.

Bug fixes:
• Fixed accessibility issues in the transaction history and Payment confirmation screens.

• If you have a NAB Home Loan, you can now add or change your offset account.
• If you’re new to NAB, you can apply for a NAB transaction or savings account through the app.

Bug fixes:
• Some Accessibility fixes

• View interest information on Home Loan Banking accounts in Account Details.
• If you have a NAB Home Loan you can get an estimated valuation for your property and find out how much equity you might have.
• See how much is due when transferring to NAB Credit Cards.
• See details of your card benefits, like rewards and insurance.
• Rollover your NAB Term Deposit quickly and easily.
• Transactions for Market Rate Facility (Business) accounts are now supported.

Bug fixes:

• Accessibility improvements.

• View interest information on iSaver, Reward Saver, Classic and Home Loan Banking accounts in Account Details.

Bug fixes:
• Accessibility improvements.

• Request a credit limit increase or decrease for your NAB Personal Credit Card.
• Customers not already registered for SMS Security can do so in the app to be able to use more features and functionality.

Bug fixes:
• Accessibility improvements.

• View interest information on iSaver, Reward Saver, Classic and Home Loan Banking accounts in Account Details.

Bug fixes:
• Accessibility improvements.

• Request a credit limit increase or decrease for your NAB Personal Credit Card.
• Customers not already registered for SMS Security can do so in the app to be able to use more features and functionality.

Bug fixes:
• Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:
- Account nicknames were sometimes not being displayed on some screens.
- Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:
- Improved stability which caused some customers to experience a crash when notification permissions were disabled in the app.
- Equipment Finance accounts are now available in the app.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:
- Home loan customers can now see their scheduled direct debits and transfers in their Transaction History screen.
- Some customers who successfully logged in with their fingerprint were being asked to log in again.
- Some home loan customers were unable to redraw their account.
- Improved data quality for our Branch and ATM location data.
- Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:
- Home loan customers can now see their scheduled direct debits and transfers in their Transaction History screen.
- Some customers who successfully logged in with their fingerprint were being asked to log in again.
- Some home loan customers were unable to redraw their account.
- Improved stability for international payments.
- Improved data quality for our Branch and ATM location data.
- Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:

- Fast Payments to BSB and Account numbers that are unsuccessful will be automatically resubmitted and processed in one to two business days.
- Increase or decrease your credit card limit.
- Approve multiple pending payments at the same time.
- View an estimate of the equity you have in a property with multiple loans.
- Set and track savings goals against transaction and savings accounts.
- Apple Watch stability and performance improvements.
- General performance and stability improvements.
- Accessibility improvements.

- Fast Payments to BSB and Account numbers that are unsuccessful will be automatically resubmitted and processed in one to two business days.
- Increase or decrease your credit card limit.
- Approve multiple pending payments at the same time.
- View an estimate of the equity you have in a property with multiple loans.
- Set and track savings goals against transaction and savings accounts.
- Apple Watch stability and performance improvements.
- General performance and stability improvements.
- Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:

- General performance, stability and security improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app:

- General performance, stability and security improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve recently updated the app:

- Fixed an issue where the Apple Watch was not loading balances properly
- Accessibility improvements with Talkback on the Increase Payment Limits screen
- Security improvements

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Add your eligible NAB card to Apple Pay to make fast, easy and secure payments.
- Improved stability which caused some customers to experience a crash after activating their card.
- Accessibility improvements with VoiceOver on the Block card screen.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:
- Accessibility improvements with VoiceOver on the Login and Payment screens.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Accessibility improvements with VoiceOver on the Login, Payment and Block Card screens.
- Improved stability which caused some customers to experience a crash after resetting their password.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Ability to scan and deposit cheques, instead of visiting a branch or ATM.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Edit your direct debits arrangement for your home loan (excluding multi-authority and multi-direct debit arrangements).

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Set up notifications when you receive money, are approaching your credit card limit, or exceed your credit card limit.
- Simply scan and store your receipts.
- Accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- View and download your statements for the last 2 years.
- Introducing a new card control, allowing customers the ability to block gambling transactions.
- Security improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Monitor and track your international payments.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- To better protect you, customers who haven't previously updated their default Pay Anyone Daily Limit may be required to input a SMS security code when making a payment.
- Find all you need to know about travel in one place, from saving for a holiday, to letting us know about your travel plans.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Improved stability which caused some customers to experience a crash when trying to make an international payment.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

You talked, we listened. Here’s how we’ve updated the app recently:

- Download a summary of your account balances.
- Improved stability which caused some customers to experience a crash when trying to make an international payment.
- General performance, security and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- We've given the Accounts screen a little makeover.
- Download a summary of your account balances or recent transactions.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Your end of financial year interest statement is ready to go.
- See 2 years of statements at a glance.
- View an interim statement for the current month.
- Get proof of your balances in seconds.
- We've updated the transaction history for credit cards, personal and home loans.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Interest and Recent Transaction Statements are now available for business customers.
- Updated transaction history for Business Cash Maximiser accounts, which includes your tiered interest rates.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and security improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and security improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and security improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Receive digital receipts directly from participating merchants.
- Accidentally transfer money out of your Reward Saver Account? We've added a warning message so you don't accidently lose your bonus interest.
- Fixed an issue where some portfolio sub-accounts were not displaying properly.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and security improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Receive digital receipts directly from participating merchants.
- Accidentally transfer money out of your Reward Saver Account? We've added a warning message so you don't accidently lose your bonus interest.
- Fixed an issue where some portfolio sub-accounts were not displaying properly.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and security improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Fixed an issue where your Quick Balance Widget would sometimes stop working.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Fixed an issue so that cheques up to $5000 can be deposited.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- We've updated the transaction history for transaction, savings and goal accounts.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.

We've made a few changes to the app:

- Book a home loan appointment at your local branch or with a mobile banker.
- Add your new card to Apple Pay, even before your plastic card arrives.
- Moved recently and forgot to update your address? When you need a new card, you can change your address to make sure your card arrives at your new address.
- We've updated the transaction history for lease and line of credit accounts.
- Improved stability as we've squashed some bugs and fixed a few crashes.
- General performance and accessibility improvements.
